'''''Lembas Extra 2012''''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Lembas (journal)|Lembas Extra]]''. The issue contains eight articles (all in English).

==Contents==
*"Preface" by Cécile van Zon (p. 5)
*Marion Kippers: "The Snergs and Their Influence on the Hobbit(s)" (pp. 6–12)
*Pamina Camacho: "Cyclic Cataclysms, Semitic Stereotypes and Religious Reforms: A Classicist’s Númenor" (pp. 13–24)
*Frank Wasmus: "A Survey among Graves: Burial Rites in Middle-earth" (pp. 25–34)
*[[Renée Vink]]: "The Parentage of Gil-galad: A Textual History" (pp. 35–44)
*Sjoerd van der Weide: "The Great War: Sauron against the Elves in the Second Age" (pp. 45–9)
*Arti Ponsen: "Fire of Orthanc: Gunpowder in Middle-earth" (pp. 50–64)
*Thijs Porck: "[https://hcommons.org/deposits/item/hc:21473 The Bones in the Soup: the Anglo-Saxon Flavour of Tolkien's ''The Hobbit'']" (pp. 65–74)
*Tyellas: "The Unnatural History of Tolkien's Orcs" (pp. 75–85)
*About the Authors (pp. 86–7)
